sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './time.scss' import MyTitle from '../../MyTitle/MyTitle' const Time = ({ darkMode }) => { const [time, setTime] = useState(new Date()) useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setTime(new Date()) }, 100) }, []) return (
Wel wel wel!
Now on the clock
{time.toLocaleTimeString()}
Today we have
{time.toLocaleDateString()}
) } export default Time
